name: Basic Hood, Black
description: This Basic Black hood is perfect for any medieval character in a LARP, SCA, Renaissance Fair or Cosplay event. This versatile cotton hood is simple, light and comfortable

name: Baldur Cap, Brown
description: Protect your head from the elements with the Brown Baldur Cap. Worn alone or beneath your helmet this cap is the perfect medieval costume piece. Made from thick cotton it will keep you warm during those cold nights.

name: Baldur Cap, Green
description: Personalize your larp costume with the Green Baldur Cap. This thick cotton larp cap can be worn under a helmet to help absorb sweat or provide additional comfort. Worn alone it provides an authentic renaissance look while protecting your head from the elements.

name: Baldur Cap, Black
description: The Black Baldur Cap is a heavy cotton cap that can be worn alone as a costume piece or under your helmet to help absorb the sweat during larp battles. It is also an excellent way to provide protection from the elements.

name: Baldur Cap, Beige
description: Keep your head warm and look good doing it with the Beige Baldur Cap. Every peasant or knight can appreciate the comfort and practicality of a good solid heavy cotton cap. This medieval cap will provide adequate protection during those cold nights and comfort on those hot days of summer.

name: Jafar Turban, Red
description: Wear the Jafar Red and Black Turban at you next larp event and give your character a little middle eastern flair. Made from layers of cotton fabric this fantastic turban has a series of beads and a long scarf lending an authentic middle eastern flair.

name: Jafar Turban, Purple
description: Our Purple and Black Turban is a cotton hat and decorated with beads. Inspired by middle eastern culture, this turban has abundant strands of fabric creating a layered effect with a long scarf. Demonstrate the wealth of your character by wearing this realistic costume Turban.

name: Altair Cowl, Dark Brown
description: Our dark brown Altair cowl acts as a type of shawl that helps conceal your identity by adding a fantastic layer to your costume. This hood reaches from your shoulders to your ankles giving a dramatic mysterious look to your larp character as you move through the crowded city streets.

name: Altair Cowl, Black
description: The black Altair cowl is perfect for any thief, assassin or rogue concealing themselves as they wander the streets. This sleek cotton hood properly drapes the around the shoulders and head acting as a type of shawl that helps conceal your identity while keeping you warm and dry.

name: Hood with Elven Ears
description: This Red wool hood comes complete with elf ears giving you a quick realistic look similar to those Sylvan woodland creatures.  A perfect costume accessory that is easy to use and is hassle free.

name: Hood with Goblin Ears
description: The Hood with Goblin Ears is a costume accessory for LARP and Cosplay. Its a wool hood with latex ears on the sides. It's a fast way to disguise your kids or your NPCs.

name: Basic Hood, Brown
description: This Basic Brown hood is perfect for any medieval character in a LARP, SCA, Renaissance Fair or Cosplay event. This versatile cotton hood is simple, light and comfortable

name: Basic Hood, Green
description: This Basic Green hood is perfect for any medieval character in a LARP, SCA, Renaissance Fair or Cosplay event. This versatile cotton hood is simple, light and comfortable.

name: Elven Hood, Beige
description: The elven beige hood is an costume part for LARP %26 Cosplay. A wool hood with elvish embroidery, cotton lining and polyester faux-fur. It will give you a great elf look.

name: Elven Hood, Green
description: The elven green hood is an costume part for LARP %26 Cosplay. A wool hood with elvish embroidery, cotton lining and polyester faux-fur. It will give you a great elf look.

name: Medieval Hood, Beige
description: This beige medieval wool hood has a hand stitched border of a contrasting color and is perfect for re-enactment. This hood can be worn by Men or Women and has a full mantel that covers the shoulders to protect you from the elements. The exterior is made of wool, the inside is made of soft cotton and hood protects you from cool breeze and is warm to wear.

name: Medieval Hood, Grey
description: This grey medieval wool hood has a hand stitched border of a contrasting color and is perfect for re-enactment. This hood can be worn by Men or Women and has a full mantel that covers the shoulders to protect you from the elements. The exterior is made of wool, the inside is made of soft cotton and hood protects you from cool breeze and is warm to wear.

name: Medieval Hood, Red
description: This red medieval wool hood has a hand stitched border of a contrasting color and is perfect for re-enactment. This hood can be worn by Men or Women and has a full mantel that covers the shoulders to protect you from the elements. The exterior is made of wool, the inside is made of soft cotton and hood protects you from cool breeze and is warm to wear.

name: Medieval Hood, Blue
description: This blue medieval hood is a garment for LARP, renaissance fair, SCA and medieval events. This unisex wool hood with contrast stitching will add style to your costume.

name: Altair Cowl, Dryad Green
description: The dryad green Altair cowl will fit well with any type of larp character. You can wear it over your head or shoulders and or even tied with a pin keeping you protected, warm and concealed through your voyages.
